Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class PowerUpCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PowerUpCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CounterAttackPowerUpCard, EndStartPowerUpCard, InTurnPowerUpCard
    public abstract class PowerUpCard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the generic methods and information common between all different types of power up cards.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerUpCard

        public PowerUpCard​(java.lang.String name,
                   AmmoColor color,
                   PlayersFilter playersFilter,
                   SquaresFilter squaresFilter,
                   ShootFunc shootFunc)
        Constructor. It assigns all the input parameters to their global correspondences
        Parameters:
        name - Name that distinguishes the card from the others present in the game
        color - Color of the ammo the card produces by being discarded
        playersFilter - The filter that describes which Players can be targeted
        squaresFilter - The filter that describes which Squares can be targeted
        shootFunc - The function that describes the effect of the PowerUpCard

    • Method Detail

      • addTo

        public abstract void addTo​(PowerUpSet powerupSet)
        This method calls an add method from the power up set of cards the card needs to added to.
        Parameters:
        powerupSet - List of power up cards

      • removeFrom

        public abstract void removeFrom​(PowerUpSet powerupSet)
        This method calls an add method from the power up set of cards the card needs to removed from.
        Parameters:
        powerupSet - List of power up cards

        Returns:
        The color of ammo associated with the card
